content: I am trying to build opencpn and ran into a problem. The include file, chcnav.h, is missing. Can someone tell me what GitHub repository to add or if the file is auto-generated by a build. I am using vs code for the build.

Hi Steve. On what operating system are you compiling? Linux? Windows? Macos? There are specific instructions for each to explain how to prepare your machine before building. Have you followed those instructions for your operating system?
Where are the build instructions? I am working on Windows 11.
Hello, not sure where to post this problem but I just compiled OCPN from github (v5.13.0) and the default dashboard plugin is not available anymore (not even in the plugin list). Any idea why ?
